idea:
Project Understanding:

We need to design and develop a website for lawyers and their service. Customers can register and search for lawyers basing their requirement. Info related to lawyers will be there in website which customers can browse through and view their profile before contacting them.

Customers can book a schedule for meeting with lawyer. We also had a discussion in regard to few clarifications and inputs from your side specifically to understand the project flow.

In this document we present our understanding of what needs to be accomplished in the project along with the budget and time estimation.

Features:

Registration for customer as well as Lawyers.

Panel for Lawyers showcasing their details

Payment integration (for live application in future)

Google map integration to track lawyer office location for customers

Search by lawyer location, lawyer services like criminal, divorce, affidavit, civil, and then schedule a meeting with the same.

A customer search will show minimal info of a lawyer related to the service which customer searches, a click on lawyer profile should go to lawyer profile, where in customer can schedule a meeting and book a slot.

Login through Facebook and Google and also normal registration form for customer is mandatory and for a lawyer registration form is required.

Showcase of the lawyer when they search one by one.

Membership like gold, silver, bronze and also share app, ratings for lawyer (in live application in future)

Web App and mobile app for same database (in live application)

Social media share and logins
name: SATYAJIT LAW SOLUTION

idea:
CASA 9 has been founded with a Vision to facilitate a Movement towards an Eco Social and Sustainable Development of our society.

The key pillars of our Organisation are:-

(a) Environment Conservation.

(b) Enable Sustainable Livelihoods.

(c) Build Eco-conscious Rural and Urban Communities.

Environment Conservation and Waste Management exudes the spirit of our brand and to achieve the same we have created a module where in, plastic waste in form of polythene bags, biscuit /cookie wrappers, detergent packets collected from landfills are combined with the waste generated from textile industry and woven into a unique fabric of its own. The textile generated has versatile benefits, and hence can be utilized in various industries. This process requires skilled manpower to achieve the results and hence we are closely working with the weavers associated with an NGO (Khamircrafts) based in Kutch. The sole purpose hereby is not only to make a difference to the waste generated but also to provide employment and livelihood opportunities for skilled craftisans who are facing umpteen challenges to earn their daily wages.

Under this label, we also undertake activities focused on awareness generation for fashion schools like NIFT to enable the GenNext to relate to the concerns faced by the rural sectors of the Industry. In addition to this, we solemnly believe and adhere to the norms of sustainable living and that’s what we strive to achieve. We believe that all facets of sustainability are interconnected and following a holistic approach shall benefit the overall social development of our community.
name: CASA9

idea:
Growing in the crucial years of the 90s, to entering in to 21st century, we realized that, the rising and fast paced life of the food industry currently, people do not take out the time to actually explore into the endangered or lesser known snacks & spices which have been left behind by our ancestors in India. They believed in serving tasty and healthy food at the same time, but due to the modern technologies and demands, we have started losing on to these roots. We at VEGICA FOODS aim to bring these unique and dying out food items which not only have the capability of giving you the same modern taste but also maintain your health at the same time. You do not have to bend down and look at your tummies, just eat and enjoy them with a stress free psyche.

Food is basic, yet people make it so complicated. Hungry? Eat! If feel like having sweet delights, go for it! One should not contemplate their food palette based on its elemental contents. Our genes know how to adapt to the environment, yet we want to adapt to a nature that does not belong to us. We passionately believe that our ancestors knew best, be it civil construction work or medicine or our bodies.


Even though our Grandmothers always knew about it, Makhana is getting a wide popularity in the current market as a healthy snack product. Meeting up with the demand of the consumers can get difficult sometimes.

We have a team of dedicated professionals who constantly put in all their best efforts to offer a quality range of makhana and also delivering the bulk consignments within stipulated time frames at your door step. Further, these are offered in customized packaging as per client's requirements and can be bought at industry leading prices from us. Harvested from natural ponds, we hygienically clean Makhanas by a Huller Machine. This makes our product completely dust free thereby enhancing the taste of Makhana. These are then sorted into different sizes with sieve of varying 'sutas' and the handpicked to maintain quality.
name: VEGICA FOODS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: SUPPLY OF MANPOWER FOR ALL TYPE OF BUSINESS ,SECUIRTY GAURD, ETC
name: GABRIEL INTELIGENCE MANPOWER SERVICES

idea:
Very few understand your car like a trusted and experienced car mechanic nearby. We too realised how difficult it is to get a good car mechanic for car repair especially in a city like Mumbai. We at Car Mechanics Online, feel the emotions attached with your car and came up with a convenient solution to build a network of trusted and qualified car mechanics in Mumbai.

Car Mechanics Online believes in convenience and transparency for every car owner with the use of technology with standard rates and no hidden charges in car servicing. Our 30+ CMO certified auto garages offer end-to-end Car Repair and Services viz. complete car service, car bodywork, engine oil change, brakes service, clutch & gear work, windshield replacement, AC service, car inspection, car denting-painting job, wheel alignment & balancing and battery jump-start, etc. Armed with technology, our partner mechanics are ready to solve your car service hassles within a short time frame and at affordable pricing. Our multi-car workshops accept multi-brand cars like Honda, Toyota, Maruti Suzuki, Hyundai, Mahindra, Tata Motors, Volkswagen, BMW, Audi, Mercedes, Ford & other car manufacturers.

A car breakdown is nothing short of an emergency and it is an absolute tragedy if you don’t find the service at any point in time. Keeping this in mind, Car Mechanics Online provides 24x7 Car Repair services in Mumbai, Navi Mumbai and Thane through its vast network of qualified car mechanics & partner workshops. Our network has grown over time on the back of strong service and cost-effective solutions. At the same time, we put in the effort to support our partner mechanics for car repair and maintenance services.

We at Car Mechanics Online, started our journey, with a vision to be on the emergency speed dial list of every car owner in Mumbai. Our single aim is to ensure that car owners get a fair deal and get to know their car better. After all, we don’t just provide a car service but also work hard to preserve the strong bond between you and your beloved car. Our team consists of automobile industry experts, specialists from the IT industry as well as those from various engineering backgrounds. We strive together every day to understand and bridge the needs of our customers by providing various models and solutions that are standardized, economical and effective in the car repair & service industry.
name: Car Mechanics Online
